pages.text: Crawling is a mechanic that prevents the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() from suffocating when inside small gaps. $(br2)Crawling covers a pose that occurs when the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() is in an area less than 1.5 blocks high. $(br2)The crawling speed equals sneaking speed.
The speed can be increased with the $(l:enchanting/enchantments#swift_sneak)$(thing)Swift Sneak$() enchantment.

pages.title: Entering crawling
pages.text: Crawling is initiated automatically in any situation that would cause the player's head to intersect a block in such a way that the area underneath the block is less than 1.5 blocks. $(br2)$(n)For example:$() $(li)Closing a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#trapdoor)$(item)Trapdoor$() on the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() $(li)Closing a $(item)Fence Gate$() when it is at the same altitude as the head $(li)Using a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Piston$() to push a block into the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$()

$(li)Exiting swimming mode in a one-block-high space $(li)Exiting $(item)Elytra$() mode in a one-block-high space $(li)Throwing an $(item)Ender Pearl$() into a one block space $(li)Having a $(l:useables/shulker_box)$(item)Shulker Box$() push the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() down $(li)Getting off a $(l:creatures/animal-pig)$(thing)Pig$() with a $(item)Saddle$() if it's under a one-block-high space $(li)Having a $(item)Boat$() land on the player's head
